entry.title: Uniswap Buys Marketplace Genie to Integrate NFT Trading Into its DEX The acquisition amount was not disclosed.
entry.summary: Uniswap Labs is planning to integrate NFTs into the largest decentralized exchange via the acquisition of Genie, an NFT marketplace aggregator, according to a post on the company’s website.

entry.title: ‘All Operations Are Normal,’ Bankman-Fried Insists as FTX Extends BlockFi $250M in Credit BlockFi CEO Zac Prince said the credit would be used “as needed”
entry.summary: BlockFi, a crypto lending platform, has secured a revolving line of credit of $250M with FTX, the second-largest crypto exchange by trading volume, leaders of both companies said Tuesday.

entry.title: Synthetix Now Among Top-Earning Crypto Protocols After Atomic Swaps Take Off
entry.summary: Synthetix is taking off after a proposal to increase trade speed was approved.

entry.title: Bancor Suspends Impermanent Loss Protection in ‘Hostile Market’ One of the First DeFi Platforms Takes Fire from DeFi Community
entry.summary: One of the First DeFi Platforms Takes Fire from DeFi Community

entry.title: Solend to Not Freeze Whale’s $216M Account After Move Decried as ‘Opposite of DeFi’ The Money Market dApp on Solana is Anxious About Liquidation Exposure
entry.summary: The Money Market dApp on Solana is Anxious About Liquidation Exposure
